title: M2 backlog
content:
Can we write 2nd sem maths backlog paper in this July summer term?
The timetable doesn't have UE23MA141B tho.
Can someone pls reply

comments.body: You can ig but gotta pay the fees first tho or ig you'll get fined
Where is the time table for backlog summer term

Yes it is 151B
But our course code is 141B,so?

The actual code is 141B
But in the timetable itâ€™s 151B
So?
better to contact someone. maybe your mentor is the best option?
bro go to the website enter the backlog registration page and enter the code it is showing up there, do it fast today or tom is last dont miss it or else you will have to write it next year
28th is the last date,i can apply tomo right.(on 28th)
Brother just apply it now why take any risk imagine the link not working tom
bro can we still apply? it says backlog registration not available here.
It closed on 28th you can try next semester or Next summer holidays
I contacted the COE, any way he could do something.
Idts man they gave an entire month to register, hopefully coe office helps you out
